cori.db 0.3.2
  • Functions

Reference

Setup and Access

Functions for setting up a database connection

set_db_credentials()

Install database credentials in your .Renviron file

connect_to_db()

Connect to CORI/RISI Postgres DB

Explore

Functions to search tables on the database

search_db_tables()

Search for table names in Postgres information schema

get_db_column_names()

Get column names for a table from the information schema

schema_size_db()

Listing DB schema size

Read and Write Data

Functions for reading and writing data

read_db()

Read a database table (convenience wrapper for DBI::dbReadTable and sf::st_read)

read_acs()

Read MDA ACS data from the database

read_sql()

Read SQL file. Vectorized over filepath

write_db()

Write data to the database. Optionally update metadata tables in the process

S3 interaction

Functions to list buckets, objects and downloading/uploading file

set_aws_credentials()

Install aws credentials in your .Renviron file and load credentials into the current environment. This actions will overwrite any values currently stored in AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.

list_s3_buckets()

Listing s3 bucket CORI draft

list_s3_objects()

List every "keys" from a bucket

get_s3_object()

get object hosted in s3 downloaded

read_s3_object()

read a text file (csv) in a s3 object in memory

put_s3_object()

put an a local file into an s3 bucket

write_s3_object()

write a data.frame into a csv in a s3 bucket

Metadata

Functions for creating, storing, and loading metadata

create_metadata_tables()

Create template field and table metadata documents

update_metadata()

Update metadata tables

load_session_metadata()

Loads session metadata from temp directory

SQL Helpers

Helper functions for running SQL code from an R session

execute_on_postgres()

Send query to postgres for execution. Vectorized over 'query'

make_aliased_query()

Create a quoted SQL query with column aliasing from named list

update_join()

Update a database table using an update join

Contents

Developed by Matt Rogers, Olivier Leroy.
